channel.title: StockHedges
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from StockHedges, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Changing Jobs Can Put a $300,000 Dent in Retirement Savings
item.description: Workers who change jobs tend to reset their 401(k) accounts at a lower savings rate without realizing it. The drag can last years into the future.

item.title: Geopolitics Still a Key Factor for Oil Markets
item.description: Phillip Nova said there appears to be profit-taking after oil prices surged last week and markets will likely experience a boost on concerns about an ...

item.title: Old Drug Repurposed for Schizophrenia Could Reap Alzheimer's Windfall
item.description: Bristol-Myers’ newly approved schizophrenia treatment might be coming full circle.

item.title: Stellantis and Aston Martin shares drop sharply after profit warnings amid China woes
item.description: Stocks of European carmakers hemorrhaged early on Monday as Stellantis and British luxury brand Aston Martin issued profit warnings.

item.title: Modelo brewer Constellation falls despite an earnings beat. Here's why we're not concerned
item.description: Constellation Brands on Thursday delivered a solid earnings report and set the stage for an anchor to be raised in the next two quarters.

item.title: Stock Futures Weaken as New Week Gets Under Way
item.description: U.S. index futures ticked lower with the focus returning to corporate earnings, as the week brings quarterly results from some of the biggest names in...

item.title: No need to sell this AI data center play ahead of earnings — and updates on 3 more industrial stocks
item.description: Deutsche Bank listed Dover as a short-term sell idea, cautioning investors of underwhelming quarterly results later that may pressure shares later thi...

item.title: Carrying a Credit-Card Balance Has Gotten Way More Expensive
item.description: Issuers are raising rates in anticipation of an $8 cap on late fees that is tied up in court.

item.title: Nike withdraws guidance, postpones investor day as it gears up for CEO change
item.description: Nike on Tuesday said it was withdrawing its full-year guidance and postponing its investor day as it gears up for a new CEO to take the helm.

item.title: Levi Strauss trims guidance as it weighs sale of Dockers business
item.description: Denim maker Levi Strauss is looking to sell its Dockers brand as the khaki maker drags down the company's overall performance.
